meanings.definition: The quality or state of being weighty or heavy.
meanings.sent1: The weightinesses of the boulder made it impossible to move.
meanings.sent2: The weightinesses of the package caused the delivery person to struggle.
meanings.sent3: The weightinesses of the feather confused the scale at the carnival.
meanings.sent4: The weightinesses of the silence in the room was palpable.
meanings.sent5: The weightinesses of the anchor dragged the boat down into the depths.

meanings.definition: The importance or significance of something.
meanings.sent1: The weightinesses of the decision weighed heavily on her mind.
meanings.sent2: The weightinesses of the task required careful consideration.
meanings.sent3: The weightinesses of the cake at the party surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: The weightinesses of the news left him speechless.
meanings.sent5: The weightinesses of the responsibility felt overwhelming at times.
